ayahs.en: Woe to those who give less [than due]

ayahs.ar: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ
ayahs.en: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full
But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss
Do they not think that they will be resurrected
For a tremendous Day
The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds

ayahs.ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ
ayahs.en: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen
And what can make you know what is sijjeen
It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed
Woe, that Day, to the deniers
Who deny the Day of Recompense

ayahs.ar: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
ayahs.en: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor

ayahs.ar: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
ayahs.en: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples

ayahs.ar: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
ayahs.en: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning

ayahs.ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
ayahs.en: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned
Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire

ayahs.ar: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayahs.en: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny

ayahs.ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
ayahs.en: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun
And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun
It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed
Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah]
Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure
On adorned couches, observing
You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure
They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed

ayahs.ar: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكٞۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ
ayahs.en: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete
And its mixture is of Tasneem
A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink

ayahs.ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ
ayahs.en: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed
And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances

ayahs.ar: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُواْ فَكِهِينَ
ayahs.en: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting

ayahs.ar: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
ayahs.en: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost
But they had not been sent as guardians over them

ayahs.ar: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ
ayahs.en: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers
On adorned couches, observing

ayahs.ar: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ
ayahs.en: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do
